alert.note: Alert for Central Cook; Northern Will; Southern Cook (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 1:56PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Will and south central Cook Counties through 230 PM CDT... At 156 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over New Lenox, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Orland Park, Tinley Park, Oak Forest, Lockport, New Lenox, Homer Glen, Mokena, Palos Hills, Lemont, Country Club Hills, Midlothian, Palos Heights, Markham, Crestwood, Worth, Willow Springs, Ingalls Park, Orland Hills and Palos Park. This includes...Moraine Valley Community College. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Cook; Northern Will; Southern Cook
